data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in South Kurdufan, Sudan a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of South Kurdufan, Sudan

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,111,900 people living in the state of South Kurdufan.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in South Kurdufan, Sudan.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, help the 4,304 believers in South Kurdufan to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of South Kurdufan, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Miri people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Miri people.
Father, help your children in South Kurdufan, Sudan find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 4,304 believers in the state of South Kurdufan the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of South Kurdufan.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.
